prompt: Check all current AADE and EFKA deadlines for the next 30 days and alert me if any are approaching within 7 days. I need this information formatted for a Greek accounting firm's morning briefing.
expectations: Connects to AADE API or website to check current deadlines
Connects to EFKA systems for social security deadlines
Calculates days remaining for each deadline
Identifies deadlines approaching within 7 days
Formats output appropriately for Greek business context
Includes system status for TAXIS and myDATA
Provides Greek holiday-aware business day calculations
Generates actionable alerts for approaching deadlines

files.name: current_deadlines.json

prompt: Monitor the AADE website for any deadline changes that occurred in the last 24 hours. If any changes are detected, send immediate alerts and update our compliance calendar.
expectations: Scrapes or monitors AADE website for deadline announcements
Compares current deadlines with previously stored information
Detects any changes in deadline dates or requirements
Generates immediate alerts for detected changes
Calculates impact of deadline changes (days gained/lost)
Updates local deadline database with new information
Formats change notifications appropriately
Provides integration points for calendar updates

files.name: deadline_changes.json

prompt: Set up automated daily monitoring that checks AADE and EFKA systems every morning at 9 AM Greek time, and sends email alerts for any upcoming deadlines or system outages.
expectations: Configures scheduled monitoring tasks for Greek timezone (EET/EEST)
Sets up email notification system with proper templates
Defines alert criteria for upcoming deadlines
Includes system health monitoring for AADE and EFKA
Creates proper cron job or scheduled task configuration
Tests email delivery and notification systems
Handles Greek holidays and business day calculations
Provides configuration for different alert severity levels

files.name: monitor_config.yaml
files.content:
schedule:
  daily_check:
    time: "09:00"
    timezone: "Europe/Athens"
    enabled: true
  
email_config:
  smtp_server: "smtp.gmail.com"
  port: 587
  recipients:
    - "accounting@company.gr"
    - "manager@company.gr"
  
alert_thresholds:
  critical: 3
  warning: 7
  info: 14
  
systems_to_monitor:
  - "AADE_TAXIS"
  - "AADE_myDATA"
  - "EFKA_Portal"
  
greek_holidays:
  - "2026-03-18"  # Clean Monday
  - "2026-03-25"  # Independence Day
  - "2026-05-06"  # Easter Monday

prompt: Generate a comprehensive weekly compliance report that includes all upcoming deadlines, any system outages, rate changes, and recommendations for the next week's accounting tasks.
expectations: Compiles all deadline information for the coming week
Analyzes system reliability and uptime statistics
Identifies any tax rate changes or regulatory updates
Generates actionable recommendations for accounting tasks
Formats report professionally for business distribution
Includes Greek regulatory context and compliance notes
Provides priority rankings for different tasks
Integrates historical data for trend analysis

files.name: weekly_data.json

prompt: Check the current VAT rates from AADE and social security contribution rates from EFKA. Alert me if there have been any changes in the rates since last month and calculate the impact on our clients' tax obligations.
expectations: Retrieves current VAT rates from AADE systems
Fetches current social security contribution rates from EFKA
Compares rates against historical stored rates
Identifies any rate changes and effective dates
Calculates financial impact of rate changes
Generates alerts for rate modifications
Provides context about rate change reasons if available
Suggests client communication about rate impacts
